name: Customer support\Sales engineer
description:
We are looking for a Customer support\Sales Engineer who will take the primary ownership over a technical assistance of a new fast-growing product designed for brands to distribute their video content across the retailers all around the world. This is a multi-functional role implying close collaboration with different teams and people and also some pure technical work. We are happy to onboard a kind, supportive and thoughtful person to this role, who likes solving new and unusual challenges and adapt to the changes.

Here's what you will be doing:

  • Сollaboration with the Sales team, preparation of some sales materials and assistance in deals closure
  • Сustomer onboarding assistance, making sure they are getting the most out of the service
  • Сustomer accounts configuration and customisation for their needs
  • Responding to ad-hoc issues, customer problems or wishes
  • acting as a medium between Sales/Customer and Development team
  • Using your superpower in applying programming skills in developing additional features or internal toolset

What we're looking for:

  • Fluency in English and Russian
  • Basic understanding of development processes
  • Knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript
  • Knowledge of SQL/NoSQL databases
  • Interest towards e-commerce
  • Attention to small details and willingness to dive deep into the context
  • Good analytical skills — customers in e-commerce are eager to operate with the data
  • A can-do attitude and willingness to learn a lot in a short time

Benefits

  • Competitive salary
  • Mobile phone benefit and paid home internet connection
  • Reimbursement of expenses for professional books and courses related to work
  • Reimbursement of expenses related to visiting conferences and professional events
  • Partial compensation for English language courses costs (60%)
  • Flexible hours - you choose when to work and from where
  • Friendly environmen
  • Possibility of relocation to Helsinki
